title: Start
body:
<<show Background intro>>

<<walk Horse left>>


Hello, and welcome to this wonderful digital game experience. We on the Terrible Gramphics team hope you enjoy learning about horse-related romantic activities.

[[Pick.Gender]]

title: Pick.Gender
body:
I was wondering, what is your gender?

[[Girl|Pick.Gender.Girl]]
[[Boy|Pick.Gender.Boy]]
[[Apple|Pick.Gender.Apple]]

title: Pick.Gender.Apple
body:
<<set $isApple to 1>>

Woof, might be need to be careful around these horses, then.

They might get... bitey...

[[Pick.Horse.Intro]]

title: End
body:
<<if $isApple is 1>>
    Well, let's take our first bite, apple!!
<<endif>>

<<if $isGirl is 1>>
    Well, let's get on with it, miss!!
<<endif>>

<<if $isBoy is 1>>
    Well, let's get on with it, mister!
<<endif>>

<<show Background main>>

title: Pick.Horse.Intro
body:
Next, we need to pick which horse to woo!

We have quite the spread of choices, hopefully there's one you like!


[[Pick.Horse]]

title: Pick.Horse
body:
Pick a horse!!!

[[Regular Brown Horse|Confirm.Brown]]
[[Special Striped Horse|Confirm.Striped]]
[[Bancho Tough Horse|Confirm.Bancho]]

title: Confirm.Brown
body:
<<set $horse to "brown">>

<<walk Horse center>>
<<switch Horse brown>>

Regular Brown Horse.
Likes: Apples
Dislikes: Spurs

Is this your choice?

[[Horse.Confirm]]

title: Confirm.Striped
body:
<<set $horse to "striped">>

<<walk Horse center>>
<<switch Horse striped>>

Special Striped Horse
Likes: Hay
Dislikes: Getting Wet

[[Horse.Confirm]]

title: Confirm.Bancho
body:
<<set $horse to "bancho">>

<<walk Horse center>>
<<switch Horse bancho>>

Bancho Tough Horse
Likes: Violence, Money
Dislikes: Apples

[[Horse.Confirm]]

title: Deny.Horse
body:
Well in that case...

<<walk Horse left>>

[[Pick.Horse]]

title: Horse.Picked
body:
Hmm... "$horse", what a good choice!

<<vibrate Horse>>

[[End]]
